title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
content: Do not waste your money!!! for basically $7 to have to change out a super plus tampon every 45 minutes is a complete joke waste of time and waste of money had I known what was inside of the box I would have never bought them and nor will I ever buy them again and no I do not recommend them not even for are you young woman. In my attached photo is a Playtex Sport super (green) and a equate brand regular (lavender), you be the judge! Also, the fact that I took the time to review and photograph tampons should tell you just how angry and disappointed I am that I wasted my money.
